text: frikken' sweet!

text: You can see by what he asks for the Teodor we know and love is beginning to take shape.

text: It is awesome that Lie bot would like a copy of People Magazine.

text: Lie Bot doesn't want a copy of People magazine. When will you people learn? Lie Bot lies .

text: If there were a magazine called ROBOTS I'd totally read it.

name: notcool
text: Schwing!

name: rowboat
text: He doesn't really want it. Just wants Todd to waste his dick suckin' money on one.

name: peterjoel
text: Or maybe he knows that People Magazine is just too big to fit in Todd's van...

name: ham_shoes
text: Ha!  Rolled up, sticking out the back like a carpet

name: tekende
text: It is possible that he doesn't want it. He's lying.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It is possible that he does want it. Lying robots got to keep up with the competition.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I wish I had a van! That would really change things for me!

text: What I want to know is why they thought all that stuff would fit in Todd's fan

text:
or van, rather

The typos have struck again

text: Jim Jarmusch movies are the best

name: nutmeg
text:
dead man! that movie is referenced later in an alt text during the mexican magical realism arch
something like
"imagine the Dead Man soundtrack played on a theremin"
NEIL YOUNG DID THAT SCORE!
love jim jarmusch, love neil young, love this fucking comic.

name: bpmead
text:
Jim Jarmusch is my favorite director. Neil Young is my favorite musician. William Blake is my favorite poet. Dead Man is an okay movie.

I imagine they're either watching Stranger Than Paradise or Ghost Dog. Maybe Broken Flowers.

name: gothicdance
text: Téodor seems like he'd be really into Down By Law

name: brokeaccount
text:
I'd place my bets on him being a Mystery Train kind of guy.

CARUL PARKINSU!

name: m_always
text:
Down By Law, TOTALLY.

All wishing he was Zack.

Or Jack. Whichever of the two was the pimp with the black gal.

Fuck I need to watch that movie again.

name: qatipay
text: "Heyo!"

name: 1000hz
text: Suckin' Dick bought that van.

name: spectre
text: Lie Bot tells the truth again. He DID want a People Magazine. But when he said that Todd's van "really changes things for us" did he lie again? Hmmm. And, uh, about Teodor's affectional preference. Could be a lie, could be the truth.

name: farqussus
text:
How do you know he DID? Did he tell you? He would have been lying. The only way you could come to that conclusion was if he told you, personally, that he didn't really want it, and you inferred from his reputation as a liar that he actually DID want it.

Then, however, he'd have told two different people the opposite things, both of which had to have been lies. Then what?

name: hendetta
text: This is the start of Todd's downfall.

name: stuart
text: Literally.

name: relaxing
text: Heyo!

text: Heyo is a common reaction to Todd's ridiculousness.
